data.title: Books Tell You Why, Inc
data.meta_description: Binding: Cloth spine Book Condition: Fine in Fine dust jacket Edition: First Edition; First Printing Publisher: New York, Cambridge, ET AL: Harper & Row, Publishers, 1980. ISBN: 0060140194
data.text:
A first Printing of the First Edition in Fine condition housed in a barely shelfworn dust-jacket that is also Fine.

This anthology includes stories by some of the most well-known and respected science fiction writers of our time, including Philip K. Dick, Ursula K. LeGuin, and William Gibson. It offers a wide variety of stories, from the futuristic to the historical, and is a perfect introduction to the genre for readers who are just starting out.; 8vo; 188 pages.
